entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as turning to Harry and raising her eyebrows.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as responding to Hermione's question about Ron's performance.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being preoccupied with his Quidditch practice performance.

relationships.description: Harry spoke to Hermione about Ron's performance.
Ron was preoccupied with Harry's opinion of his Quidditch practice performance.
Hermione asked a question to Harry about Ron's performance.
Harry associated himself with Gryffindor, as he was trying to get the chant 'Gryffindor are losers' out of his head.
